intent_atoms.description: Metadata value type follow-up is marked complete after landing decoding support for GIF, TIFF, and signed fixed-point MP4RA data types.

Extended BoxParserRegistry+Metadata to recognize GIF (type=0x00000C), TIFF (type=0x000010), and signed fixed-point (type=0x000041, 0x000042) payloads, including signature fallbacks for legacy samples.
Added SignedFixedPoint metadata kind plus GIF/TIFF data formats to ParsedBoxPayload and wired JSON export encoding for the new structure.
Metadata parser unit tests cover the new formats and verify both field summaries and parsed detail models.

functional_units.name: Metadata Value Type Decoding
functional_units.description: Decodes metadata payloads for GIF, TIFF, and signed fixed-point MP4RA data types

functional_units.name: BoxParserRegistry+Metadata Extension
functional_units.description: Extends the box parser registry to recognize new metadata value types and handle legacy signatures

functional_units.name: SignedFixedPoint Metadata Kind
functional_units.description: Introduces a new metadata kind for signed fixed-point values

functional_units.name: GIF/TIFF Data Formats Support
functional_units.description: Adds support for GIF and TIFF data formats in parsed payloads

functional_units.name: JSON Export Encoding for New Structures
functional_units.description: Wires JSON export encoding to include the newly added metadata structures

functional_units.name: Metadata Parser Unit Tests
functional_units.description: Provides unit tests covering new formats, field summaries, and parsed detail models
